properties.name: mcn.bootstrap.eagerLoad.enabled
properties.description: 是否在引导上下文中加载.

properties.name: delete.default.log-file.enabled
properties.description: 是否默认删除默认日志文件.

properties.name: spring.security.strategy
properties.description: SecurityContextHolderStrategy模式.

properties.name: mcn.log.file.filter-level
properties.description: 日志文件输出过滤器级别.

properties.name: mcn.log.file.name
properties.description: 日志文件名称(仅仅文件名,不含路径).

properties.name: mapper.scan.additional-package
properties.description: 额外需要扫描的包.

properties.name: multiple.datasource
properties.description: 多数据源配置.

properties.name: mybatis.multiple.datasource.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用mybatis多数据源自动配置.

properties.name: jpa.multiple.datasource.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用jpa多数据源自动配置.

properties.name: dynamic.datasource.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用动态数据源配置.

properties.name: base.package.name
properties.description: base包路径(适用于mybatis和jpa多数据源).

properties.name: dao.package.name
properties.description: dao包名称.

properties.name: filter.cross.enabled
properties.description: 是否开启跨域支持.

properties.name: mcn.xss.enabled
properties.description: 是否开启XSS过滤.

properties.name: global.rule.pattern
properties.description: 特殊字符规则.

properties.name: mcn.print-env.enabled
properties.description: 是否打印环境配置.

properties.name: http.error.override
properties.description: 是否重写http错误信息.

properties.name: xxl.job.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用调度执行器自动配置.

properties.name: swagger.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Swagger.

properties.name: groovy.web.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用groovy web.

properties.name: mcn.repeat.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用防重复提交.

properties.name: param.processor.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用参数处理器.

properties.name: data.integrity.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用数据完整性校验.

properties.name: management.health.mcn.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable mcn health check.

properties.name: erase.decrypted-data.enabled
properties.description: 是否删除解密后的数据.

properties.name: main.class
properties.description: 指定主配置类(仅war包模式生效).

properties.name: jackson.subtypes.package
properties.description: jackson subtypes扫描包路径多个以逗号分割.

properties.name: mcn.execute-time.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用请求执行时间记录.
